title: how can you change you're client language to korean???
body: im trying to change my client language to korean but i dont know how.Can someone help me??? rip how can i change my client language to korean is what i ment in the tittle

replies.body: For now Korean is not one of the [**supported languages**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751594) on the NA server. You can select which language you'd like to switch to just below the password box when you're logging into the game client.
